mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA ( QNA_NO, MEMBER_NO, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CATEGORY, QNA_NAME, QNA_LEVEL, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_DATE, QNA_SECRET, QNA_PASSWD ) VALUES ( QNA_NO_SEQ.nextval , MEMBER_NO_SEQ.nextval , #{QNA_NAME} , #{QNA_LEVEL} , #{QNA_CATEGORY} , #{QNA_TITLE} , #{QNA_CONTENT} , SYSDATE , #{QNA_SECRET} , #{QNA_PASSWD} )
mapper.select: SELECT QNA_TITLE, TO_CHAR(QNA_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS QNA_DATE, QNA_CONTENT FROM QNA WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{MEMBER_NO}
